member.name: T:Appccelerate.Formatters.FormatHelper
member.summary: Provides functionality for formatting strings.

member.name: M:Appccelerate.Formatters.FormatHelper.SecureFormat(System.IFormatProvider,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary:
Replacement for the String.Format method, that throws an exception when the count of arguments does not match the count of placeholders.
If format and/or args are null then still a string is returned.
member.param: The arguments to the format string..
member.returns: Returns the fully formatted string, if successful In case of an error, the format string and all parameters added in a list will be returned.
member.remarks: Tries to format with String.Format. In case of an Exception the original format string and all parameters added in a list will be returned.

member.name: M:Appccelerate.Formatters.FormatHelper.ConvertToString(System.Collections.IEnumerable,System.String)
member.summary: Converts a collection of objects to a string representation.

member.name: M:Appccelerate.Formatters.FormatHelper.ConvertToString(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.Object,System.Object},System.String)
member.summary: Converts a dictionary of object, object to a string representation in the form of Key=Value.
member.param: The separator to separate key value pairs.

member.name: T:Appccelerate.Formatters.StringTruncationFormatter
member.summary: Allows to define the maximal length of an string. A string longer than the given value will be truncated. Use: Format("{0,-5:L5}", "123456") -> "12345" Use: Format("{0,5:L5}", "123") -> " 123" Use: Format("{0,-5:L10}", "1234567890123") -> "1234567890"

member.name: M:Appccelerate.Formatters.StringTruncationFormatter.GetFormat(System.Type)
member.summary: String.Format calls this method to get an instance of an ICustomFormatter to handle the formatting.

member.name: M:Appccelerate.Formatters.StringTruncationFormatter.Format(System.String,System.Object,System.IFormatProvider)
member.summary: After String.Format gets the ICustomFormatter, it calls this format method on each argument.
member.param: The arguments for the format string.

member.name: T:Appccelerate.Formatters.TypeExtensions
member.summary: Contains extension methods for Type.

member.name: M:Appccelerate.Formatters.TypeExtensions.FullNameToString(System.Type)
member.summary: Correctly formats the FullName of the specified type by taking generics into consideration.
member.param: The type whose full name is formatted.

member.name: T:Appccelerate.ValidatedNotNullAttribute
member.summary: The attribute is used to decorate an argument in a argument validating method that it is being validated against null in the validating method. The attribute is used within the methods and should not be used elsewhere.
